description: Represents a card in a card list.

props.name: color
props.description: Specify a hover color for the card.

props.name: clickable
props.description:
Specify card is clickable. This will return click events when the card is clicked on. NOTE: use the href in the
card model instead of clickable=true if card is a link.

events.name: click
events.description: Emitted when a card is clickable & the card is clicked & not disabled.
